subtitle: hi this is Simon Jacobson and welcome to
meaningful Monday's where we answer your
personal questions the question this
week is about infertility I've always
believed that the purpose of life is to
raise children to contribute to society
and it's been my lifelong dream to be a
mother my husband and I have been
married over a decade and I've never
been able to conceive despite countless
efforts and methods is there anything I
can do on a spiritual level to remedy
this and how can i reconcile my life's
purpose if I indeed can't have children
well my heart goes out to you and to
your husband children is the greatest
blessing in life it perpetuates it's the
future and there's probably nothing
sadder when one has difficulty in having
children but firstly let's rule out all
the medical situations have you seen a
second doctor have you seen a third
doctor often it comes down to looking
and keeping on looking at not just
listening to one medical expert and
really ruling out that there isn't some
physical or some psychological or other
factor that may be involved we have to
rule that out first secondly going more
to the spiritual side of things
sometimes the energy between husband and
wife and how they interact with each
other has an impact on the channels on
blessings of having children are you and
your husband on the same page do you
both want children do you have arguments
and conflicts because these are all
factors that may in some way impede the
channel that allows the blessing of
children tend to your life now if you
deal with all these situations and you
rule out any of these factors then of
course we have to address the actual
issue now I want to believe that the old
decade has passed you will be blessed
with children so I don't want even talk
about a scenario otherwise but should
god forbid that not be the case always
remember that God would not deprive you
and your husband of the great blessing
of children without giving you something
that can compensate for it and that's
why we have a beautiful statement in the
Talmud that says one who teaches the
child of another is as if they gave
birth to
that person again I want to wish you you
have your own biological children but
remember by inspiring another person by
educating another person you have the
power tuna sense give birth to them
spiritually psychologically emotionally
gotcha bless you and your husband and
all people who need blessings for the
channel to have children in this world
that they should actually come a parent
and that channel should be open and we
should do our part in not allowing any
of the impediments to block the flow
this has been meaningful Mondays thank
you for watching if you'd like to submit
your personal question please click on
the link below everyone have a very
meaningful
